channel.description: Guys i need to know how to make a ineterface with rules on it My other questions How do i add commands like ::givering to give you say a recoil or something(just an example not gunna use it lolz) How do i make a certain weapon have better bonuses than other weapons how do i make a pk pointshop (guys i really need help badly on this one)Its for the main bit of my source cause im using like a pking source

item.title: Making a rules interface[help]Also a few more qs
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Client.Java… Just search a command and put it under that one… Such as rares, hit (CTRL+F) and search “rares” or another name of a cmd… But it right under the end of the command. Not very hard. Hope you can do that.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a rules interface[help]Also a few more qs

item.title: Making a rules interface[help]Also a few more qs
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“recoil”))
{
addItem(####,####);

}[/code]

first ## is the item id, second is how many.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a rules interface[help]Also a few more qs
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Taken straight out of my server :

			if (command.startsWith("rules")) {			
	sendQuest("@dre@Rules", 8144); // Title
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("@dre@Massacred World Official Rules", 8145);
		sendQuest("@dbl@No asking for staff, all staff positions are earned.@dbl@", 8148);
		sendQuest("@dbl@No flaming or spamming, may result in a mute.@dbl@", 8149);
		sendQuest("@dbl@No scamming / pkpoint trading.@dbl@", 8150);
		sendQuest("@dbl@No advertising any other server or website.@dbl@",8151);
		sendQuest("@dbl@No multiple-logging in.@dbl@",8152);
		sendQuest("@dbl@No impersonating any member of staff.@dbl@",8152);
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
	 }

Read full topic
